qa_pairs.question: What is the publication frequency, editorial leadership history, and impact factor of the Journal of Economic Theory as described in the source context?
qa_pairs.answer: <statement>The Journal of Economic Theory is published bimonthly.<cite>[S1]</cite></statement> <statement>Karl Shell has served as editor-in-chief since 1968, later sharing the role with Jess Benhabib, Alessandro Lizzeri, Christian Hellwig, and others, including Alessandro Pavan, Ricardo Lagos, Marciano Siniscalchi, and Xavier Vives.<cite>[S2][S3]</cite></statement> <statement>The journal had an impact factor of 1.458 according to the 2020 Journal Citation Reports.<cite>[S6]</cite></statement>
qa_pairs.chunk:
Passage 1:
[S1] Journal of Economic Theory


# Journal of Economic Theory



The ***Journal of Economic Theory*** is a bimonthly peer-reviewed academic journal covering the field of economic theory. [S2] Karl Shell has served as editor-in-chief of the journal since it was established in 1968. [S3] Since 2000, he has shared the editorship with Jess Benhabib, Alessandro Lizzeri, Christian Hellwig, and more recently with Alessandro Pavan, Ricardo Lagos, Marciano Siniscalchi, and Xavier Vives. [S4] The journal is published by Elsevier. [S5] In 2020, Tilman Börgers was chief editor of the journal. [S6] ## Abstracting and indexing

According to the *Journal Citation Reports*, the journal has a 2020 impact factor of 1.458.

[S4] The journal is published by Elsevier. [S5] In 2020, Tilman Börgers was chief editor of the journal. [S6] ## Abstracting and indexing

According to the *Journal Citation Reports*, the journal has a 2020 impact factor of 1.458.
